document_data.name: Ulena
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulena the Fox''' was a [[lillend]] [[proxy]] of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] [[power]] known as [[Selûne]] and was that goddess's principal proxy.
document_data.Personality: Ulena was very conscientious when it came to her duty as a guardian of the [[Gates of the Moon]], being suspicious of and questioning all who sought to enter Selûne's divine realm.
document_data.Activities: Out of all planar visitors, Ulena particularly sought to keep out the more violent and glory-seeking inhabitants of [[Ysgard]], on account of the fact that when killed her species and Selûne's [[shards]] were not reborn in the same way that [[petitioner]]s were.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some rumors claimed that Ulena was in particularly vile moods whenever it was a [[Selûne (moon)|new moon]].
